titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Lincolns-Inne, July 15th. 1655 At the funerall of Ferdinando Leigh Esq; son to the Right Honourable the Lord Leigh, of Stoneleigh. And a member of that honourable society. By Brune Ryves, D.D. and D. of C. preacher to that honourable society.
titleStmt.author: Ryves, Bruno, 1596-1677.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Lincolns-Inne, July 15th. 1655 At the funerall of Ferdinando Leigh Esq; son to the Right Honourable the Lord Leigh, of Stoneleigh. And a member of that honourable society. By Brune Ryves, D.D. and D. of C. preacher to that honourable society.
titleStmt.author: Ryves, Bruno, 1596-1677.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Wing R2451A which gives printer's name as: T. Roycroft.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
